title: Not bad but not perfect
text: I had visited this place at my vacation in Athens. Tasty portions but the prices it were a little bit higher than i expected it and small portions. You have to try it to make your decision.

title: Average rating
text: We visit this rooftop with some friends. The food was good, the service was average but the prices for this place i think was a little bit expensive. Needs improve.

title: Italian gelato
text: We visit this place many times after our dinners. It's an authentic Italian gelateria. They have many flavours and vegan and gluten free options. I recommend it for every time.

title: View trap
text: I took many photos to saw you the amazing view. But the service needs change or the mentality of boss need change. Something it's going wrong here. The best thing it's to drink a coffee in one not busy day. Very disappointed

title: The view it's not enough
text: We were here for the lake all day long so we decided to stay for dinner. The food was average but the prices very high for that's service. You need improve.

title: Nansy's
text: You can find here a lot of desserts. Traditional and modern. It's very busy always but always they are ready to help you. The quality of desserts needs improve.

title: A for Athens
text: We went here two times. One at the sunset and another one at night. The view it's breathless but the service need to be more human and the prices are a little bit expensive.

title: Time to relax
text: We visit this place after searching at internet. Everything was perfect. We really relaxed here after a busy day. The prices are normal.

title: Temple of Olympian Zeus
text: The Temple of Olympian Zeus also known as the Olympieion or Columns of the Olympian Zeus, is a former colossal temple at the center of the Greek capital Athens. It was dedicated to "Olympian" Zeus, a name originating from his position as head of the Olympian Gods. Construction began in the 6th century BC during the rule of the Athenian tyrants, who envisaged building the greatest temple in the ancient world, but it was not completed until the reign of the Roman Emperor Hadrian in the 2nd century AD, some 638 years after the project had begun. During the Roman period the temple, which included 104 colossal columns, was renowned as the largest temple in Greece and housed one of the largest cult statues in the ancient world.

title: Oldest Neighborhood of Athens
text: Plaka is the old historical neighborhood of Athens clustered around the northern and eastern slopes of the Acropolis and incorporating labyrinthine streets and neoclassical architecture. Plaka is built on top of the residential areas of the ancient town of Athens. It is known as the "Neighborhood of the Gods" due to its proximity to the Acropolis and its many archaeological sites.

title: Library of Adrian
text: Hadrian's Library was created by Roman Emperor Hadrian in AD 132 on the north side of the Acropolis of Athens. The building followed a typical Roman Forum architectural style, having only one entrance with a propylon of Corinthian order, a high surrounding wall with protruding niches (oikoi, exedrae) at its long sides, an inner courtyard surrounded by columns and a decorative oblong pool in the middle. The library was on the eastern side where rolls of papyrus "books" were kept. Adjoining halls were used as reading rooms, and the corners served as lecture halls.

title: Greek hospitality
text: In Donousa island you can find these greek plates. The greek hospitality in great plates and kindly service. Nikos the best.

title: Ancient Achaia
text: You can find here ancient exhibits from 15th century B.C until 2nd B.C. Friendly staff and beautiful environment that's you gone back to the history of Greek people. I recommend it for sure

title: Brunch
text: The best brunch cafe in city of Athens. Amazing choices and nice service. The prices are normal. I recommend it for sure

title: You have to try it
text: This traditional restaurant it's at heart of Psiri. Good greek food like lamb but to deserve the 5 starts they have to upgrade their services. By the way good try

title: Rooftop
text: I spent a lot of my days at Athens rooftop's and this was the most beautiful place. Good service, many choices and the value prices. I recommend it for sure

title: Almost good
text: The place it's beautiful the most for coffee and some snacks. Good service but rude supervisor. They need a lot of work to improve.

title: Nice shisha
text: I am shisha lover and this place it's very good option if you want to try at centre of Athens. The service it was very kind.

title: The view it's not enough
text: We took here two main dishes and a bottle of rose wine. The food was average and the wine good. But guys only the view it's not enough.

title: Nice desserts
text: As we going around at the center of Athens we face this cozy desserts coffee. Tasty desserts and a lot of options .

title: Amazing view
text: We ordered a burger, a Cesar's salad and a bottle of Greek wine. The food was really good, the wine also. The view at night amazing but the service needs improvement.

title: Great time
text: We visit the museum of Acropolis yesterday. We spend 2 hours there and learned many things about ancient Greek history.

title: Monument
text: You can feel the energy of the rock of Acropolis everywhere. Great monument of global heritage. You have to go
